# Reflecting on Urbanization Through Conceptual Frameworks

![topic, conceptual framework.png](data:image/png;base64,)


| Topic                          | Conceptual Framework   | EU*                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Importance to Know | WBFW* |
|--------------------------------|------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------|-------|
| Urban systems vs Rural Systems | Systems-Sustainability | It is important to understand the systemic differences between urban and rural areas because it provides a perspective on various settlements and an insight into how they function as a result of their status as a settlement. |                    |       |
|                                |                        |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                    |       |
|                                |                        |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                    |       |
- EU: Enduring Understanding
- WBFW: Worth Being Familiar With
